1370: Ysaac was born in Die lange straet3 in 1370.
Got married to Rycaldis at age 29 in 1370.
Had a son with Rycaldis, Bartrarde, at age 29.
1373: Had a son with Rycaldis, Lubertus, at age 32.
1374: Had a son with Rycaldis, Karel, at age 33.
1375: Had a son with Rycaldis, Evergero, at age 34.
1379: Had a son with Rycaldis, Radulphus, at age 38.
1381: Lost his wife Rycaldis while she was giving birth to Imsoete in 1381.
1385: Lost son Lubertus when Lubertus was 13 years old.
